'''1.94''' was an update to [[PlayStation 4 Edition]] released on June 27, 2019, which fixed a bug.<ref>{{tweet|4JStudios|1144273064387141632|A bug fix patch for Minecraft: PS4 Edition is rolling out now to fix some player reported issues with the Toy Story world in the recent update. Fix list is here|June 27, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
; 1 issue fixed
* Fixed a possible crash while exploring the Toy Story mash-up world.
